name: 99 Hearts, Valentine's Edition
description:
Just in time for the season, new candy hearts edition. Smash candy clusters to eliminate them all. Then, challenge your friends to a shootout and see who's the best match three crusher.

99 Hearts brings our lovely candy to life with physics and visuals that are fun and dynamic. Candies fall, tumble and get stuck just like in a jar. Each candy is rendered in full 3D, representing all your favorite flavors, and colors change each new game, and since the favorite is red, there are always red ones. How fun is that! 99 Hearts is an iOS exclusive, fast, fun and addictive.

Instructions:
Tap a candy to match at least three of the same color, but get as many as you can together for bigger scores and a chance to find the hidden present. You've only got 99 Hearts, so use them wisely, strategy is key to maximum scores.

It's time to start tapping ... 99 Hearts!

Highlights:
Realistic candy 3D physics.
Shootout w/Friends.
HD candy heart graphics.
Sequential matching.
Completely freeform packing.
Hidden present bonus.
Perfect game bonus.
New colors every game.
Dramatic lighting effects.
Multiple difficulty levels.
High score tracker.
Game Statistics.
